name: Consumer Council for Water
goal:
The Consumer Council for Water is the independent representative of household and business water consumers in England and Wales. The Consumer Council for Water is sponsored by Defra and the Welsh Government.

Our remit is to make sure the consumers' voices are heard and acted upon in the water debates across England, Wales and Europe.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Environmental Directives that might have an impact on water bills of water and sewerage customers in England and Wales.
